title: Twitter sued by Dutch town Bodegraven-Reeuwijk over paedophilia rumour
description: A conspiracy theory falsely claims that Bodegraven near The Hague was once home to a Satanic ring.

title: IHG hack: 'Vindictive' couple deleted hotel chain data for fun
description: The pair, who say they are from Vietnam, wiped out IHG group data after a foiled ransomware attack.
